home.paragraph: In AndrevLare, we design websites that connect with your audience and grow your business. Boost your online presence with creativity and tailor-made solutions.

CTA.title: Having A Website Matters
CTA.card1p: Your online business accessible Anytime, Anywhere.
CTA.card2p: A well-designed website positions you as a trustworthy professional.
CTA.card3p: Expand your market and reach customers around the world.
CTA.card4p: Convert visitors into customers with effective calls to action.
CTA.card5p: Optimize SEO and digital advertising strategies to attract more traffic.
CTA.card6p: Design your image as you want the world to see it.

contact.title: Take Your Online Presence To The Next Level
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell me how you want to take your business or brand to the next level!

socialMedia.title: Follow me on all my social networks or contact me through them!

services.title: My Services
services.1card1: Single page with content focused on a single objective (promotion of a product or service).
services.1card2: Clear and visible Call to Action (CTA) (such as 'Subscribe', ''Buy now', etc.).
services.1card3: Section of testimonials or success stories.
services.1card5: Visually appealing design with a focus on conversion.
services.2card2: Section to show previous projects or work.
services.2card3: Direct contact (form or link to social networks).
services.3card1: Multiple sections: Home, About Us, Services, Blog, Contact, etc.
services.3card2: Professional and personalized design for the brand.
services.4card2: Minor bug fixes or design adjustments.

phrase.span: ' I don't program to solve problems, I program to create solutions '
